Actions.Name: Delete row
Actions.Description: Deletes a row from a Informix table

Actions.Name: Get row
Actions.Description: Retrieves a single row from a Informix table

Actions.Name: Get rows
Actions.Description: Retrieves rows from a Informix table

Actions.Name: Get tables
Actions.Description: Retrieves tables from a Informix database

Actions.Name: Update row
Actions.Description: Updates an existing row in a Informix table

Actions.Name: Insert row
Actions.Description: Inserts a new row into a Informix table
